settings.title: Contact Us
settings.text_1_text: For inquiries regarding your orders, shipments, returns and exchanges, or assistance in selecting the ideal product for your needs, please don't hesitate to reach out to us at official@eu.atomstack.com.
settings.text_2_text: If you encounter any challenges while utilizing our products, please do not hesitate to get in touch with us at support@eu.atomstack.com. We are here to assist you.

settings.title: AtomStack Cooperation
settings.content:
If you want to cooperate with AtomStack on causes like education, public welfare, innovation, etc, or if you want to review our machines, feel free to email us.

Business Partnership：promoting@eu.atomstack.com

Media and KOL Cooperation：marketing@eu.atomstack.com

settings.title: Feel Free to Contact Us
settings.content:
We Offer Email and Live Chat Services, for email service please contact the two email address shown above. For Live Chat please click the Help icon and leave us messages, we will be responding on our work time.

Please visit our company office at:

17th Floor, Building 3A, Phase II, Intelligent Park, No. 76, Baohe Avenue, Baolong
Street, Longgang Dist., Shenzhen, 518172, China

Or

RM03, 24/F, HO KING COMM CTR, 2-16 FAYUEN ST, MONGKOK
KOWLOON, HONG KONG
